1:
My God and King, I will proclaim that you are very great;\q1 I will praise you now and forever.
\q1
2:
Every day I will praise you;\q2 Yes, I will praise you forever.
\q1
3:
Yahweh, you are great, and you ought to be praised very much;\q2 we cannot fully realize how great you are.


\q1
4:
Parents will tell their children the things that you have done;\q2 they will tell their children about your mighty deeds.
\q1
5:
I will think about how you are very glorious and majestic,\q1 and I will meditate on all your wonderful deeds.


\q1
6:
People will speak about your powerful and awesome deeds,\q2 and I will proclaim that you are very great.
\q1
7:
People will remember and proclaim that you are very good to us,\q2 and they will sing joyfully that you always act justly.



\q1
9:
Yahweh, you are good to everyone,\q2 and you act mercifully to everything that you have made.


\q1
10:
Yahweh, all the creatures that you made will thank you,\q2 and all your people will praise you.
\q1
11:
They will tell others that you rule very gloriously as our king\q2 and that you are very powerful.
\q1
12:
They will do that so that everyone will know about your powerful deeds\q2 and that you rule over us gloriously.


\q1
13:
You will never stop being king;\q2 you will rule throughout all generations.



\q1
14:
Yahweh, you help all those who are discouraged,\q2 and you lift up all those who have lost hope.
\q1
15:
All of the creatures that you made expect that you will provide food for them,\q2 and you give them food when they need it.
\q1
16:
You give food to all living creatures generously,\q2 and you cause them to be satisfied.



\q1
17:
Everything that Yahweh does, he does justly;\q2 all that he does, he does mercifully.
\q1
18:
Yahweh comes near to all those who call out to him,\q2 to those who call to him sincerely.
\q1
19:
To all those who have an awesome respect for him he gives what they need.\q2 He hears them when they cry out to him and saves them.


\q1
20:
Yahweh protects all those who love him,\q2 but he will get rid of all the wicked people.
\q1
21: I will always praise Yahweh;\q2 I wish that all people everywhere may praise him forever, for he does everything perfectly.
